comment: The workload for this course is just ridiculous. Nothing but research paper after research paper after research paper...
Way too much work; alot of which I felt like was just busy work.  I spent over 30 hours a week studying and completing assignments in her class. AVOID TAKING HER CLASS!

This class was EXTREMELY time consuming.  I spent more time on this class than my other two classes combined.  I did get an A, but only because I spent 15-20 hours per week on this class. Instructions were vague and grading was very strict. If you are going to take it, don't take it in the summer.

DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS ONLINE! It requires at least 30 hours a week! Because of this class I will never take another online course again! And the teacher expects high quality work when it is an entry class.  I had to look up "how to write a..." topics for hours and then write for more hours. Directions are vague and expectations are high.

Took online class in the summer. Was extremely time consuming. I wouldn't suggest taking it in the summer. I got a high A, but spent a huge amount of hours on this course. Other than the work level, the other issue was it was team taught which caused a bit of confusion. Teachers didn't respond to email on wkends even when assignments were due.

Take her If you don't have a job, a family or a LIFE..!! Because you'll have to spend about 12 hrs per week just for this class, weekly posts, element k,a project. I took this class online for the convenience of not having to go to campus, I ended up spending way more time on this class. She is helpful, but though grader.

I took her online and it consumed A LOT of my time. Make sure you have enough time to devote because without at least 6 or 7 hours a week dedicated to this class you won't do well. Leeds is a nice lady though. She is always willing to help.

This is a great on-line class. Don't get me wrong.. You will have to work for your A!!  Very time consuming posts and assignments.  Her instructions are sometimes unclear, but she will always help you.  Definately take her.  You will have to work for your A!!
It was a good class!
Wants everything to be exactly the way she wants it...it is an easy class if you take the time to do the work..but not an easy A

Do not take this professor if you want an easy "A". ONLY take this professor class if you want her help in preparing you for the job market. (Isn?t that why you are in school?) She is a fair professor who expects you to work hard. If you do work hard and put forth effort of QUALITY, she will reward that effort. She is an asset to K.S.U.
this is the greatest teacher eva!

She makes you do a very time consuming group project. At this point she gets pissed at anyone who doesn't understand and WILL humilite you in front of the class if she deems your question was uncalled for (keep in mind that she thinks that EVERY one should understand her crappy and vague expanations of the project which is pretty complex).

I took this class online during the summer semester and it was alot of work and is front loaded with the bulk in the first 2-3 weeks.If you take it online plan on spending time everyday doing something with this class. I didn't use the book much. The syllabus was pretty clear. I also emailed her frequently to get clarification.

I took this course online this summer and it was LOTS of work. I ended up making an A in the class, but I worked hard and I had to email her a bunch because her instructions were not very clear sometimes.

Hard class.  Lots of work.  Leeds is a great professor, but expects a lot from her students.  I took this class online and it was a huge load.  Syllabus is "course contract" to her, so when in doubt, refer to it (very lengthy and envovled).  Sometimes I felt like she expected way too much, but in the end I wasw satisfied with my grade, so yay :)
Fabulous! Great speaker, cares a lot, very smart woman!

Very knowledgeable professor. She takes too much of class time lecturing and then you spend the last 15 minutes of class trying to remember and do what she just explained. I left class many times frustrated. Instructions aren't clear at times and she goes so fast. If you work with others who know the work, then you will do excellent in her class.
Easy. Not really clear on her instructions. Class is pretty much project based. a lot of extra credit.

I had to take the class with Ali and made a C.  I took it with her and made an A because she cares.  She is a great speaker and has excellent lectures.  Awesome professor.  Tests are easy.  I didn't even buy the book and I left with an A.  (wouldn't recommend though because next semester you will need it for activities with the books cd)

Lots of projects, but what do you expect in this kind of class? Individual projects like Microsoft Word and Excel aren't too bad. Exams are open book and open Internet. Final group project is a killer. Way too much work for this type of class and it's a big part of your grade. A lot of times her directions are unclear. No attendance policy

She is possibly the greatest speaker I've ever had the privilege to meet.  She's always very prepared for class, keeps things interesting, and hasn't the slightest problem helping with any difficulties.  Unfortunately, I'm changing majors, otherwise I would take her again.
No Comments

Class has a lot of work involved outside of class. Group project is the WORST and a huge part of your grade. No attendance policy, everything is online. Exams are open book. You need to take this when you have an easy semester because there is a lot of work involved

She is a great teacher, makes the class fun and easy to understand. The individual projects are not hard if you pay attention in class. Don't need to know Excel (just the basic computer proficiency), she explains bit by bit. GREAT class and very helpful. Definitely applicable to real life.

The workload in this class is crazy stupid. I dropped it, lol. To much work expected of you for a breeze through class, take it when you have some time to do Excel, Powerpoint projects along with a crazy group project. The webct stuff is nice though.

Everything is on WEBCT - if you like it, you'll love this class - if not, you won't.  You could get an easy A in this class.  Technology can be frustrating.  She's nice; She'll help if you ask.  Lot o' projects - Individual's great;Group-U're on your own.
No Comments
Great Teacher! Course is so easy expecially if you know how to work Excel. Come to class and you will get an A.
GREAT TEACHER! GREAT COURSE! This was by far the most helpful class in the Coles College of Business I have ever taken. The professor really knows how to teach the material well.
